description.en: Contains a piece of the Sinbad set, an Upcut stone, and a small chance for a Magic Carpet

description.cns: 有机率可获得魔法飞毯飞行道具
description.de: Aus dieser Box kannst du per Zufall entweder einen Magic Carpet, Sindbad Outfit oder einen Upcut Stone erhalten.

description.id: Berisi bagian dari Sinbad Set, Upcut Stone, dan berpeluang kecil mendapatkan Magic Carpet
description.it: Contains a piece of the Sinbad set, an Upcut stone, and a small chance for a Magic Carpet
description.jp: 魔法のじゅうたん、服などがもらえます。
description.kr: 마법의 양탄자, 신밧드 세트, 신밧드 의상 각 부위, 업컷스톤 중 한가지가 나오는 선물상자
description.nl: Contains a piece of the Sinbad set, an Upcut stone, and a small chance for a Magic Carpet

description.ru: Внутри может быть предмет из комплекта принца/принцессы Персии, ограненный аквамарин и иногда даже ковер-самолет.
